data.subtitle: Hi!
data.text: I'm Emilia. I'm a junior javascript developer, with great knowledge in frontend and backend. I use mostly React, Redux, Node, Express and Sequalize. I look forward to learning more

- Librarian/a of educative institutions, ISFT 182 (3 years)
    In this course i learned to seek, manage, curate and share information. I also incorporated both, pedagogics and psychology background knowledge.

Deserted :

    That experience was an initiation for pedagogics and academic level readings

data.subtitle: Work experiencie
data.text:
- Tutor at Henry (since September 2020)

I give extra classes on the topics of each class, I solve doubts and give moral support.

- Teaching Assistant at ISFT 182 (since March 2020)

I offered two workshops on gamification and use of video games for libraries

- Substitutions in school libraries (2017 to 2019)

This experience taught me a lot. To manage and work with big groups of people with different ideas. I read tales, poetry and gived workshops in primary and secondary schools
